channel.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
channel.description:
EDIT: Thanks guys, solved it by swapping out uncommented for commented code... Simple fix, just didn't know where to look for it. Lol, I feel silly...
Hi-
I recently reverted the gameframe in my old delta client back to the default for its revision, however I noticed the (option stones? the buttons you click to navigate different tabs i.e. quest tab/skills tab) are not in the right location...
Here's an image (I cropped it down to save space). As you can see, the icons are off a tad:
[img]https://pg5eug.blu.livefilestore.com/y2poIksQxcHeo3QPFKRgnOAKtS-_rw5cLblXI6yZfSu5cgHYbeeiVzkISIcfYCpau-12vEl7MI9ek1ILW_3Ih4Yqr5XDkNKnmHM8aeqVICksZk/Capture.PNG?psid=1[/img]
I'm just asking for a tip to what file/location I might search inside. I should be able to do the rest.

item.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Well. actually it couldn’t have been any easier… I just switched the commented code for the non-commented and I have everything in the right spot! Thanks a lot for the help with finding that section!

Read full topic

That’s why I posted the non commented ones…

K well I think I know what I’m doing. I’ll post back if I come up with any trouble, but I should be fine.

there’s a lot of commenting around there… :\

item.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I believe it would be this:

                if(anIntArray1130[anInt1221] != -1)
                {
                    if(anInt1221 == 0)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1143.method348(6, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 1)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1144.method348(45, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 2)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1144.method348(78, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 3)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1144.method348(111, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 4)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1144.method348(144, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 5)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1144.method348(177, 16083, 5);
                    if(anInt1221 == 6)
                        aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_1146.method348(209, 16083, 7);
                }
                if(anIntArray1130[0] != -1 && anInt1054 == 0)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[0].method348(13, 16083, 10);
                if(anIntArray1130[1] != -1 && anInt1054 == 1)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[1].method348(47, 16083, 9);
                if(anIntArray1130[2] != -1 && anInt1054 == 2)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[2].method348(80, 16083, 9);
                if(anIntArray1130[3] != -1 && anInt1054 == 3)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[3].method348(113, 16083, 10);
                if(anIntArray1130[4] != -1 && anInt1054 == 4)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[4].method348(144, 16083, 7);
                if(anIntArray1130[5] != -1 && anInt1054 == 5)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[5].method348(178, 16083, 7);
                if(anIntArray1130[6] != -1 && anInt1054 == 6)
                    if(anInt1161 % 20 >= 10);
                aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array947[6].method348(212, 16083, 11);
            }

item.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

I'm just asking for a tip to what file/location I might search inside.
Lol.. I don't have a deltascape client.. But this is found in one of the clients I do happen to have: [code=java] public void drawSideIcons(){ if(is480 || is508 || is525) { /* Top sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[0] != -1)//attack sideIcons[0].drawSprite(10+3, 4); if(tabInterfaceIDs[1] != -1)//stat sideIcons[1].drawSprite(43+3, 4); if(tabInterfaceIDs[2] != -1)//quest sideIcons[2].drawSprite(76+3, 3); if(tabInterfaceIDs[3] != -1)//inventory sideIcons[3].drawSprite(111+3, 5); if(tabInterfaceIDs[4] != -1)//equipment sideIcons[4].drawSprite(140+3, 1); if(tabInterfaceIDs[5] != -1)//prayer sideIcons[5].drawSprite(174+3, 1); if(tabInterfaceIDs[6] != -1)//magic sideIcons[6].drawSprite(208+3, 4); /* Bottom sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[7] != -1)//summoning sIcons483[7].drawSprite(11+3, 303); if(tabInterfaceIDs[8] != -1)//friends sideIcons[8].drawSprite(46+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[9] != -1)//ignore sideIcons[9].drawSprite(79+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[10] != -1)//logout sideIcons[7].drawSprite(113+3, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[11] != -1)//options sideIcons[11].drawSprite(145+3, 304); if(tabInterfaceIDs[12] != -1)//emotes sideIcons[12].drawSprite(181+3, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[13] != -1)//music sideIcons[13].drawSprite(213+3, 303); } else if(is474){ /** Top sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[0] != -1)///attack sideIcons[0].drawSprite(10+3, 4); if(tabInterfaceIDs[1] != -1)///stat sideIcons[1].drawSprite(43+3, 4); if(tabInterfaceIDs[2] != -1)///quest sideIcons[2].drawSprite(76+3, 3); if(tabInterfaceIDs[3] != -1)///inventory sideIcons[3].drawSprite(111+3, 5); if(tabInterfaceIDs[4] != -1)///equipment sideIcons[4].drawSprite(140+3, 1); if(tabInterfaceIDs[5] != -1)///prayer sideIcons[5].drawSprite(174+3, 1); if(tabInterfaceIDs[6] != -1)///magic sideIcons[6].drawSprite(208+3, 4); /** Bottom sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[7] != -1)///clan sideIcons[7].drawSprite(11+3, 303); if(tabInterfaceIDs[8] != -1)///friends sideIcons[8].drawSprite(46+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[9] != -1)///ignore sideIcons[9].drawSprite(79+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[10] != -1)///logout sideIcons[10].drawSprite(113+3, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[11] != -1)///options sideIcons[11].drawSprite(145+3, 304); if(tabInterfaceIDs[12] != -1)///emotes sideIcons[12].drawSprite(181+3, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[13] != -1)///music sideIcons[13].drawSprite(213+3, 303); } else if(is562){ /* Top sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[0] != -1) newSideIcons[0].drawSprite(8+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[1] != -1) newSideIcons[1].drawSprite(37+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[2] != -1) newSideIcons[2].drawSprite(67+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[14] != -1) newSideIcons[3].drawSprite(97+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[3] != -1) newSideIcons[4].drawSprite(127+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[4] != -1) newSideIcons[5].drawSprite(159+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[5] != -1) newSideIcons[6].drawSprite(187+3, 8); if(tabInterfaceIDs[6] != -1) newSideIcons[7].drawSprite(217+3, 8); /* Bottom sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[10] != -1) newSideIcons[15].drawSprite(8+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[9] != -1) newSideIcons[8].drawSprite(38+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[8] != -1) newSideIcons[9].drawSprite(70+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[7] != -1) newSideIcons[13].drawSprite(97+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[11] != -1) newSideIcons[10].drawSprite(127+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[12] != -1) newSideIcons[11].drawSprite(157+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[13] != -1) newSideIcons[12].drawSprite(187+3, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[15] != -1) newSideIcons[14].drawSprite(216+3, 307); } else { /** Top sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[0] != -1)///attack sIcons459[0].drawSprite(32, 11); if(tabInterfaceIDs[1] != -1)///stat sIcons459[1].drawSprite(57, 9); if(tabInterfaceIDs[2] != -1)///quest sIcons459[2].drawSprite(86, 9); if(tabInterfaceIDs[3] != -1)///inventory sIcons459[3].drawSprite(116, 4); if(tabInterfaceIDs[4] != -1)///equipment sIcons459[4].drawSprite(155, 5); if(tabInterfaceIDs[5] != -1)///prayer sIcons459[5].drawSprite(183, 5); if(tabInterfaceIDs[6] != -1)///magic sIcons459[6].drawSprite(212, 10); /** Bottom sideIcons */ if(tabInterfaceIDs[7] != -1)///clan sideIcons[7].drawSprite(31, 300); if(tabInterfaceIDs[8] != -1)///friends sIcons459[7].drawSprite(57, 306); if(tabInterfaceIDs[9] != -1)///ignore sIcons459[8].drawSprite(85, 308); if(tabInterfaceIDs[10] != -1)///logout sIcons459[9].drawSprite(121, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[11] != -1)///options sIcons459[10].drawSprite(157, 305); if(tabInterfaceIDs[12] != -1)///emotes sIcons459[11].drawSprite(187, 302); if(tabInterfaceIDs[13] != -1)///music sIcons459[12].drawSprite(211, 302); } } [/code] Notice the .drawSprite(X, Y);

item.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Can you clarify what you mean by the id of the icon? I looked at my cache with one of the cache editors and found sideicons.dat with 13 different ids [(images) 0-12]. Is that what you meant? Also, to narrow my search, what methods/places in the file would it be in?

Read full topic

item.title: Shift Position of Client Sprites...?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It’d be in client.java
Each icon has a different ID in the client.
find/search the IDs, you should get their X and Y based off that, move em around.

Read full topic
